column1: Uchi////Uchi is what happens if perfection has a child with delicious.  No joke named my dog Machi after Machi Cure.  Don't mess around and get the unbelievable salmon sashimi
column3: flounder pieces uchi vichi for your cold dishes.  Hot dishes go with the karrage
column5: and shishito peppers.  You can't go wrong with any dessert.  I love uchi and I'm not afraid to scream it
